# QuillPilot Swift/AppKit Desktop App Setup

## Progress Tracking

- [x] Create .github/copilot-instructions.md
- [x] Get Swift macOS project setup info

- [x] Build analysis engine foundation
- [x] Design UI layout with toolbar and sidebar
- [x] Build and test proof of concept

## Project Details

**Type:** Swift macOS Desktop Application
**Target:** macOS 13.0+
**Architecture:** AppKit with NSTextView for native text editing
**Purpose:** Proof of concept for QuillPilot writing tool with bulletproof editor stability

### Core Features
- Native NSTextView editor (rich text support)
- Writing analysis engine (paragraph length, passive voice, sensory details)
- Split view UI (editor + analysis sidebar)
- Formatting toolbar
- QuillPilot brand colors (orange #ef8432, navy #2c3e50, cream #fef5e7)

### Technical Stack
- Swift 5.9+
- AppKit (native macOS UI)
- MVC architecture
- NSTextView for text editing
- No web technologies
